message.body: Hey, sorry for the stupid question, but: I'll be safe wearing jeans to the office tomorrow, right? The dress code seems all over the place!
Haha. Prom dress only. Jk. Jeans are cool as long as no flip flops t shirt etc. Yum headwaters....
Thanks re dress code. Grr re headwaters. I will go have some tasty scotch in lieu of good beer.
